text: so at Nika this is a short and sweet
summary of how to make Thai style young
coconut ice cream for the full version
please click on the link in the
description let's get started
in a pot combine coconut milk palm sugar
white sugar salt and cook until the
sugar is completely dissolved when
finished remove from heat and stir in
some young coconut water and if you want
a bit of vodka to keep it from freezing
to hard chill as a mixture and proceed
according to your machines instructions
for making sorbets I'm also adding some
young coconut meat and jackfruit to make
it a little more interesting when it's
ready to have your coconut ice cream
thai style serve it over sweet sticky
rice the same one I made for mango and
sticky rice and sprinkles and peanuts or
toasted mung beans you can also serve it
in a bun like we often do in Thailand
and that's it for all the details of
this recipe you can click here to watch
the full version and please click to
subscribe if you enjoy my videos I will
see you next time cop Khun kha
